__e: I have stood next to him here in the village for many days.
She'd been inside it for days, barely able to breathe.
He'd just... lock himself in his room for days.
When my village was destroyed, I stayed in the forest for days.
You spend all day lounging in a bed of noble thoughts, and that's how you carry out your duty.
You know, I couldn't get that question out of my head for days, so that was the start of a journey that didn't end until I found the answer.
You were not there, you have not seen me for days.
You know, I haven't seen you for days and I treat you like wallpaper.
